dcterms:creator: Jun Xu
Tao Mei
Ting Yao
Yong Rui
dcterms:description: A large-scale video description dataset which contains 10K video clips collected from the Internet. These video clips last for 41.2 hours in total, covering the 20 representative categories and diverse visual content collected with 257 queries in the video engines. The dataset contains 200K clip-sentence pairs, and each clip is annotated with about 20 natural sentences.
dcterms:title: MSR-Video-to-Text (MSR-VTT)

dcterms:creator: David L Chen
William B Dolan
dcterms:description: MSVD contains 1,970 Youtube video clips, 85K English descriptions collected by Amazon Mechanical Turkers. The dataset is split into contiguous groups of videos by index number: 1,200 for training, 100 for validation and 670 for testing.
dcterms:title: YouTube-to-Text (MSVD)

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: UCF101 is a dataset of 101 human actions classes from videos in the wild.
dcterms:title: UCF-101
